title: In case anyone did not get what WookieCookie said
body:
1. Anime is bad for you.
2. I like strawmanning.
3. I'm a Puritan by heart.
4. This avatar would be grounds on banning.
5. Loli/Lolita/Lollygagging will be added to the list of 13 bad words in addition to Pedal.
6. He still knows about xxlolicon420xx
7. All of WookieCookies friends are afraid to tell him he's strawmanning.
